buginformation.summary: column indicating caret sometimes not error output
buginformation.description: for some reason the caret doesn always show the output when there are errors when test looks like this alert the output this java jar compiler jar test test error parse error missing after argument list error warning however when test looks like this notice the line break after the semicolon alert the output this java jar compiler jar test test error parse error missing after argument list alert error warning that the simplest reproduction the problem that could come with but just encountered the problem file with 100 loc this the first time believe run into the problem but when happens error parser fails and becomes pain track down the raw output find the actual problem tested against 1171 committed the problem present going back least 1000 this isn new issue fixed and will come with the next release this issue was closed revision 1215 this issue was closed revision 1218 this issue was closed revision 1220
